name: Exiled (2022)
description:
Hello, thank you for your interest in this project ! Here are some things you should know before downloading !

I/ This student project was made as a group of 15 students, with 8 in the core team working daily, in the following fields : 

  • 7 *Game Designers
  • 2*Programmers
  • 2*Animators
  • 4*3D artists

II/ Technical details

The game was developed on Unreal Engine 4.27 and the production lasted 8months. We only used the Blueprint scripting system and no C++ was added. Can be played with keyboard and mouse or Xbox/PS4 controller.

III/ Game purpose 

As an exiled, you must fulfill the quest tasked by your creators to redeem yourself and gain eternal rest.  

Armed with your sword and the help of divinities, you will triumph in battle and achieve your goals.

IV/ All feedback is appreciated !

As a student project, the game could contain bugs or placeholders in various parts of the game. We would be grateful for any feedback, advice or new ideas that you may have !

We hope you will enjoy your experience
